ValidationRule.description: stage can only be manually updated from 'Not yet commenced' to 'In progress'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Final") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Recall") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Submitted") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approval In Progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approved") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Not yet commenced"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Rejected") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage can only be manually updated from 'Not Yet Commenced' to 'In progress' or 'Archive'
